meanings.sent1: The hotness of the sun made everyone seek shade.
meanings.sent2: I could feel the hotness of the stove as I cooked dinner.
meanings.sent3: The hotness of the chili pepper caught me by surprise.
meanings.sent4: The hotness of the debate left everyone feeling uncomfortable.
meanings.sent5: The hotness of the fire burned brightly in the night.

meanings.definition: The level of heat or temperature.
meanings.sent1: The hotness in the room was unbearable without air conditioning.
meanings.sent2: I adjusted the thermostat to increase the hotness in the house.

meanings.sent4: The hotness of the summer day made the asphalt sizzle.
meanings.sent5: The hotness of the tea warmed me up on a cold morning.
